package.name: abb_rws_service_provider
package.description:
Provides a ROS node implementation that exposes a set of ROS services, for sending requests to an ABB robot controller via Robot Web Services (RWS) communication.
RWS requests can for example be: - Resetting the RAPID program pointer. - Starting/stopping the RAPID program. - Reading/writing IO-signals or RAPID variables.
package.author: Jon Tjerngren
